longBusinessSummary: Pyrophyte Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. It focuses on effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or other similar business combination with one or more operating businesses or assets in the energy transition industries. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Houston, Texas.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Sten L. Gustafson B.A., J.D.
companyOfficers.title: Pres, CFO & Director
